prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Branch Cabell Notes, Accession # 5947-m, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library on 21 March 1968.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains autograph notes by James Branch Cabell regarding his works. The originals are in accession #5947-i.
